com.cisco.pxgrid.samples.ise

Class SampleParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cisco.pxgrid.samples.ise.SampleParameters

  • public class SampleParameters
extends Object
    A class to manage the collection of command line parameters for the samples. Customer implementations using pxGrid clients will likely gather this information from other sources. So this class is only useful to manage parameters in the context of the samples.
    Author:
    jangwin

      • process

        public org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine process(String[] args)
                                           throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                  org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        Parses an array of string arguments presented by the user into more structured arguments that can be read by the samples.
        Parameters:
        args - arguments presented by the user
        Returns:
        a processed form of the arguments presented by the user
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - argument state is not what was expected
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - arguments could not be parsed
